title: Lyse Doucet: In Tehran, rallies for Iran's revolution overshadowed by discontent and defiance
summary_full: The BBC visits the Iranian capital for the first time since authorities used unprecedented force to put down protests last month.
summary_public: The BBC visits the Iranian capital for the first time since authorities used unprecedented force to put down protests last month.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: authorities used unprecedented force to put down protests
